name: Big Enough To Escape
description:
We made this game for the BUG Fall Jam 2021. The theme was "It's bigger in the inside"

I the game player is trying to solve the puzzles by using the mechanic that makes some of the things bigger in the inside part of the game.

Game Designer: Furkan Kaan Topkara

Game Artist: Barkın Özkan

Game Programmer: Uzay Yıldız

Audio: Doğa Kıbıcı
